Package crud

Class ProductCrud

java.lang.Object
crud.Crud
crud.ProductCrud
public class ProductCrud extends Crud
The ProductCrud class provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete) operations in the Product Table

  • Method Details

    • insertProduct

      public void insertProduct(Item item) throws SQLException
      Inserts a Product into the Product table
      Parameters:
      item - An Item Object containing all details (itemName, description, price, qty, type, imgPath) to be entered into the Product table. Note: imgPath is the associated file location to the image for each respective Product
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error for insertion of a product

    • getAllProducts

      public List<DisplayItem> getAllProducts() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all Products from the Product table
      Returns:
      A List of DisplayItem object's
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should a product not be found in the table

    • getProductsInStock

      public List<DisplayItem> getProductsInStock() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all Products from the Product table
      Returns:
      A List of DisplayItem object's
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should a product not be found in the table

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct(int productID) throws SQLException
      Deletes an Product item from the Product table based on its product ID
      Parameters:
      productID - The ID of the product to retrieve
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should a product not be found in the table

    • updateItem

      public void updateItem(Item i) throws SQLException
      Updates a Product from the Product table based on its Product ID
      Parameters:
      i - The Item object with which is being updated
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should a product not be found in the table

    • updateQty

      public void updateQty(Item i, int amount) throws SQLException
      Updates a Product from the Product table based on its Product ID
      Parameters:
      i - The Item object with which is being updated
      amount - The qty of the item
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should a product not be found in the table
